item.title: Where Does It Begin?
item.description: Overview As the very first post on this website, I think it should help me set out on the journey to practice my writing skills. The very first thing is to make sure I can always remember how I set up the website from scratch… Website Set Up Simple! Make sure to: have a GitHub account learn to create a GitHub Pages site Now, the website should be ready! To push the simple method forward a little bit, I’m thinking about using Hugo.
